txt.en: A raiding party from Gundabad has been spotted approaching the fortress of Skarháld, in Ered Mithrin. No different than all other Gundabad raiding parties, this one seeks to slay all in their path….\n\nYour mission is to defend the fortress of Skarháld from a Gundabad raiding party.
You have been tasked with defending the fortress of Skarháld from a Gundabad raiding party.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'My scouts have reported that a raiding party from Gundabad marches towards Skarháld! I am certain the large raiding party seeks to attack our fortress in Ered Mithrin! We must depart for Skarháld immediately and assist in thwarting this raiding party!'
Some monsters in this mission will apply a flaming reflect shield to themselves.
Your mission is to defend the fortress of Skarháld from a Gundabad raiding party.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Skarháld.
'Well done! With the raiding party defeated, Skarháld is once again safe! The last thing we need is our greatest fortress of Ered Mithrin in ruin!'
